title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama endpoints as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-affinity and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that sends selected text or buffer to Ollama and streams the response into a split or floating window.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; supports generate, chat, pull and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; offers idiomatic Ruby blocks for streaming responses.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over HTTP; easy drop-in for Next.js or CRA apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection friendly interfaces.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes and insert results back into editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks pairing Ollama with Open-WebUI, Flowise, n8n and more.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds /ollama slash command to summarise blocks or brainstorm using local models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async client for Ollama with tokio and reqwest.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with std.http client and no external dependencies.
